marklogic.body: Expand@undefined:disqus i ALSO LOVE HOW THEY POTRAY THIS MARTIN GUY AS A KID AND SHOW A FOOTBALL PHOTO OF HIM WHEN HE WAS 12, BUT FAIL TO SHOW HIM NOW AFTER BEATING UP ZIMMERMAN. THEY PORTRAY MARTIN AS A LITTLE BOY WALKING HOME FROM SCHOOL, YEAH RIGHT, HE WAS WALKING HOME, (YES ZIMMERMAN FOLLOWED HIM AND DIDNT DESERVE TO BE SHOT) BUT ENDED UP KICKING ZIMMERMANS BUTT, BREAKING HIS NOSE AND HE WAS BLEEDING FROM HIS HEAD. SERIOUSLY, THEN THEY MAKE IT A RACE ISSUE WHEN ZIMMERMAN IS CLEARLY NOT RACIST, WHY WOULD BE MENTOR 2 BLACK KIDS THEN. WAKE UP PEOPLE. ALSO, HIS FACEBOOK VIDEOS SHOWING HIM LIKE A GANSTER, WELL, BEAT SOMEONE UP LIKE A GANSTER, ACT LIKE A GANGSTER, GET KILLED LIKE A GANSTER. EXACTLY WHY ZIMMERMAN WASNT ARRESTED, SELF DEFENSE. I WOULDNT HAVE SHOT HIM, BUT ZIMMERMAN DID AND PER THE POLICE IT WAS JUSTIFIED. END OF STORY, SAD BUT TRUE!
